titles.title: Supporting policies that are a part of the "Best is Yet to Come" blueprint, outlined by President Trump during his historic, optimistic State of the Union Address.
Supporting policies that are a part of the "Best is Yet to Come" blueprint, outlined by President Trump during his historic, optimistic State of the Union Address.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary: This resolution declares that the House of Representatives supports policies that expand the economic growth outlined by President Trump in his State of the Union address.
